body_html: @acgtyrant broadcasting only add new dimensions to the beginning of the tensor, so if you want broadcast to work you need either to have b be of shape 3x1 or of shape 2, because a is of size 3x2. Check https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.13.0/user/basics.broadcasting.html for more details on the broadcasting rules
body_text: @acgtyrant broadcasting only add new dimensions to the beginning of the tensor, so if you want broadcast to work you need either to have b be of shape 3x1 or of shape 2, because a is of size 3x2. Check https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.13.0/user/basics.broadcasting.html for more details on the broadcasting rules
body: @acgtyrant broadcasting only add new dimensions to the beginning of the tensor, so if you want broadcast to work you need either to have `b` be of shape `3x1` or of shape `2`, because `a` is of size `3x2`. Check https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.13.0/user/basics.broadcasting.html for more details on the broadcasting rules
